name: Super Dig Clicker
description:
My first Godot game, created in my off-time for Juice Jam II. Background song is 8BIT8 by Xehao.

Left mouse to power up your shovel and release to dig a hole / M to mute and unmute the music. Catch as many marbles as you want -- there's no end goal, and to be honest the game's kind of just an endless dopamine treadmill, so do with that what you will.
